Package com.se.goBears.repository

Interface ResourceRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Resource,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Resource,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Resource,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Resource>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Resource,Long>
public interface ResourceRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Resource,Long>
This is a repository interface for Resource entity.
